settings.title: What our clients said about Essentials
settings.content: Here’s what you need to know about your pixfort, based on the questions we get asked the most.

testimonials.text: Essentials theme is awesome! There are unlimited possibilities to create great looking websites in minutes. Great work! I am a web designer, you guys are very inspiring. I wish to see more work from you, maybe more freebies. Using pixfort products made my life a lot easier!
testimonials.name: Marc Antoine
testimonials.title: via pixfort.com
